template.p: When making products available online, make sure you have enough stock. The confirmation of a quotation or a website sale can triggers the creation of a delivery order to your customer in the Inventory app. You can always see how much of each product you have available in the Inventory app menu, as well as on each individual product form.
If the stock levels are too low, Odoo is capable of triggering a purchase order for the products to the right vendor, in the Purchase app.
